attributes.action: Tell Peter Bone to hang in there.  We know the rule that can be broken by an MP has yet to be written so he will be exonerated, WHATEVER HE DID.
attributes.additional_details: We all know what was going on once an MP says 'I have done no wrongdoing' or 'I have broken no rules'.  Among our out and out corrupt politicians those two statements have been used so many times by so many dishonourable electeds, they are now taken, by the electorate, as a clear admission of guilt.
